main.head: Family Portrait
main.p: Yigit Koroglu is a freelance artist focusing on illustration and concept art. He has worked in the video game industry and created illustrations for card games and fantasy books for clients such as Wizards of the Coast, Adultswim, Titmouse, Bushiroad, Bandai Namco, Applibot, Fantasy Flight Games, NGMOCO, and Paizo.
